name: lithographic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
printed using a stone or metal block on which an image has been drawn with a thick substance that attracts ink, or relating to this process: Traditionally crafted lithographic prints, watercolours and woodcuts are on show. Lithographic printing became cheaper and easier as the decade progressed. See
lithograph
More examplesFewer examplesThe photograph is an original and not a lithographic reproduction.Large-format lithographic posters provided an effective method of conveying information.The required documents are printed from a lithographic plate.
